Text: AutoPlay Media Studio 5.0 makes it easy to create just about any multimedia software application you can dream up. Beginners can benefit from the visual drag and drop environment, while power users will appreciate the powerful "script" engine. You can create everything from autorun CD's to interactive training, presentations, demos and CD business cards. Simply drop images, audio, video, web and flash components onto pages and add interactivity with the wizard.
Seed plz  is this Indigo Rose software
